body: Today i was swimming in my pool then i tryed to jump but i jumped too far..... so i broke my arm... And guess what...  it was my pvp hand.... i can still pvp but not that good
body_tagged: Today i was swimming in my pool then i tryed to jump but i jumped too far..... so i broke my arm... And guess what...  it was my pvp hand.... i can still pvp but not that good
title: Well Something bad happened today :(

replies.body:
Oh god, I'm kinda my pool is gonna kill my arm now xD
Anyways, part of my foot got broken in soccer practice, so we're on the same boat! xP
Keep on practicing PVP because when you get better, you'll be unstoppable >:D
